SELECT contentID, campNm, induType, location, doNm, sigunguNm, animalEntry, img FROM campSiteInfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND manStatus = '운영'
AND doNm LIKE '%${doNm}%'
AND campNm LIKE '%${campNm}%'
AND location LIKE '%${location}%'
AND induType LIKE '%${induType}%'
AND animalEntry LIKE '%${animalEntry}%'
ORDER BY views LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT count(*) FROM campSiteInfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND manStatus = '운영'
AND doNm LIKE '%${doNm}%'
AND campNm LIKE '%${campNm}%'
AND location LIKE '%${location}%'
AND induType LIKE '%${induType}%'
AND animalEntry LIKE '%${animalEntry}%'
ORDER BY views
